overview.en: The goal of nbg is to build a fully anonymous 5g application public chain initiated by the 5g global alliance of industrial applications, build a global 5g + blockchain data authentication application ecosystem, build a general-purpose, supporting function perfect, high performance, rich application scenarios, easy to use, user experience good public chain system and related infrastructure, and build a block chain ecosystem of 5g combined with data authentication application.
overview.zh: NBG的目标是由5G工业应用全球联盟发起的一款完全匿名5G应用公链，打造全球5G+区块链数据确权应用生态体系，构建一个通用、支撑功能完善、性能高、应用场景丰富、易于使用、用户体验好公链体系及相关的基础设施，打造5G结合数据确权应用的区块链生态系统。
